lines.text: And it was Fjord and Jester going to this one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We were going to the other one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, this one over here, go ahead and roll investigation checks for me, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to-- The Traveler is with you, literally.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you add a d4? Because I gave you Guidance, that's the whole point of me patting you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, sorry, I rolled with advantage, 24 plus--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you can't give him Guidance and advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you're actively helping him with the thing, it's like stacking a thing onto a thing you're doing simultaneously.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what was your first roll?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She seems mad, but she really just has peanut crumbs all over her mouth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm literally just trying to take food out my--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Picking her teeth with her tongue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And on the floor where it would be carpet or hardwood or whatever the interior you'd expect, it's just this tongue material.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see the texture of the little flesh, cilia-like buds all across it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have to-- I have to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me, too. I really want to touch it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to just reach down and pet it, and see what it feels like.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, you're going to get spit on your hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh, it's literally like a tongue!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's going to call them here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, nothing on the ceiling, nothing that attracts the eye, anything like that besides this tongue shell of a house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but when you do see is a similar pale texture to the interior and (splort, splort splort) the dampness you felt was a saliva-like liquid the dampness you felt was a saliva-like liquid that is just slowly dripping from the ceiling in places.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we want to get a vial of this and give it to Veth or anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll take out one of my random vials and scoop up some of the spit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ew, I can't smell spit, that's so fucking gross.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it for science, do it for Veth!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh okay. Well, that's good, no scent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The spit coming from the ceiling, is there a hole in the ceiling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see where it's coming from.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a little speed bag up there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is no abode uvula, no. (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we're good to leave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, who's investigating which? So you and Essek are investigating--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The one with the bridge, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And getting into the second floor, there is a singular person sitting on a stool in the center.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like looking at the corner like in Blair Witch?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, currently just looking down at the knees.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Josh, tell us where you are!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this your, is this your domicile?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Screams like a bitch. I'm going to float my way up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whooshes) He flings a finger forward and you watch as a bolt of flame hits and it ignites and the screaming slowly withers as it burns away-- And it's gone and the screaming stops.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (relieved sigh) Still arrive in the window, hah! Was that you? Essek?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Another one of the strange denizens here."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The ones with the flapping tendrils and teeth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best not to be leaving alarms here and there as we go, yes?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there more to investigate in here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's pretty blank beyond that individual.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, meet everybody else back outside.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So that's the bridge to the buildings.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's just us in that last little cabin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then there's two strange statues on this side, but let's try the house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, investigation checks from both of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you looked at the bottom of the fountain, Beau?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got like a 23 and just water, I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like a body horror, Warner Brothers lot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just for fun, I'm going to tap where the second floor would be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The stairs continue to like (squishing) appear and lead upward.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I thought so. All right, I'm heading up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You head up and you are now on the roof of that building there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to-- are you behind me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to float out the window and brush against the window stone as we're going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you touch it and it's weirdly warm to the touch, and it does give a bit with a bit of pressure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I cast Decompose as I pass by.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, I got it right. (laughs) It's always a bit dicey for a moment, but I pushed through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But the skin begins to gray and behind you can see fungus beginning to build, and lichen and other elements of decomposition begin to take hold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I bet you don't like that, all right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And it takes root, right? It doesn't, like, start and then fight it off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see no signs of it pulling back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to Superman spiral over to the statue figure that I see by the gazebo tower and take a closer look at it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's two of them. One's off camera right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's okay, ready? One, two, three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But as time has gone on, they're just a blank face on a relatively featureless body.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, then I will just push past and walk into the bottom of the tower.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have we explored every building now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You would have said if there was text on it, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you can make an investigation check if you want to look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like at a certain point it creates this weird, lip-like line in the floor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And does the eyesight tell me that this is a magically hidden exit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not magically, this is a physical line in the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to finger it open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you touch the exterior, and it does give a little bit on your finger, it opens up into a similar port hole filled with teeth and the stairs continue downward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think to everybody: winner winner chicken dinner.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I check out the other statue in the other corner?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go over and inspect it and it's an exact duplicate of the other statute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's an odd focus to detail for not having much detail.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the idea of a memory.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A lot of what here and not a lot of why.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I float quickly past everyone and head into the gazebo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But those of you who are very perceptive, as you look forward it seems to just faintly corkscrew before it reaches the outside of your periphery.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And the surfaces here are still spongy or no, we're in metal now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It feels more metallic than flesh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes a moment, but it begins to change color.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This stuff knows what it's supposed to be.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God, how did it turn into that night?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But there is writing on these three tunnels.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I will take care of that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While he's doing it, I'll hand a vial of--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That implies that there's a top shelf, expensive drool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Instead of just the house drool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You might want to give it a test.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will definitely run some tests.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Figured the the pH could be of interest to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will sneakily drop it on the floor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just sort of slide it into the flesh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just goes into the wall like a meat baster.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I sprinkle soot and salt in front of my vision and can read the writing on the walls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The opposite side, it just says, "Help, help, help, help, help, help help, help, help, help, help, help, help." The one across from you says-- Oh, what does it say there? It was specifically here-- "Crest Vault."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I try to roll for Divine Intervention?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have we ever heard "Crest Vault" before?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Threshold crests, yes, that makes sense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chittering) Arty's not in at the moment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe we need to call for help.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just give him a little scritch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes! It adds to his psychosis.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Could we make it Sprinkle shirt that says that? "Please, I want to die among the stars." (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, those things up top were relieved to be killed and maybe--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that direction's probably a fight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that we can find-- Maybe it's just a matter of calling who we want to talk to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said the tunnel corkscrews, the one ahead of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems to shift a little bit to one-- It begins to turn slightly one way before the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This way, like very fun house-style?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And that's towards the Crest Vault?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We might be able to talk to her, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's true, I don't need to do shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Talk to some of these people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or Cree, if we are linked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The only problem with Cree is that I'm assuming Lucien can listen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lucien could be listening to you right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, is everyone still wearing their medallion?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't matter; he talked to you when we were in Aeor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Doesn't mean he knows where we are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It could be that one way thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How much time do we have?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we have to get to the crests before they activate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we coming Tamora a friend?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it couldn't hurt to find out, and if something terrible happens, it's not like, what are we going to do? If it's not Cree, we're--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can try speaking to Timorei directly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, let's talk, I mean, we've talked to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we're on the precipice of the Crests--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We just need to go, we need to follow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we keep going and check out the Crest Vault?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Perhaps if we can cut off Cree and stop this on one of the two crests, then Lucien's--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, and we have more time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can assume it's Cree because--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because of the way they spoke of her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Continuing onward, on foot for those who wish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some people move faster on foot than--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then I'm going to hop every now and then.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I move a little bit faster, so I'm going to float.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do too if I float, so I'm going to float.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, Essek is the fastest of all of you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do that wall run occasionally.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah, upside down wall, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's got me beat by 150 years.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's only not a contest if you're winning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as you're heading forward you hear footsteps getting louder.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Coming towards us or from behind us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Coming towards from the direction that you're traveling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we going to kill her?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there a way to hide?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you look around-- For lack of a better way of explaining it, mild folds in the walls that you might attempt to utilize at your disposal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to make myself look like the old woman with the bun on her hair that we saw in the town square.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll squeeze into a flesh fold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll become one of the strange blank people as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to choose a fold, as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will snuggle into a fold and cast Mage Hand just to have out.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I'll go into a fold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone who's attempting to... step into a fold, go ahead and roll a stealth check for me, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks for blowing that towards me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Burned my mouth, so, be ready.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I give you Blessing of the Trickster?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all sit there and wait, the two of you out in the open with your shapes changed and everyone else--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just looking in pitch darkness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly, which everyone by Caduceus can see at this point, if the sword has been extinguished at this point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it sound like Cree breathing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And there is a faint, curious upturn to a growl, like a (growls).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ah, I was wondering when you would catch up." And we're going to end there for today.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have-- I have some thoughts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are not six, we are like, we are--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're eight. We got Essek, we got Sprinkle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're kind of broken at the moment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You might lose Beau and Caleb.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're not super broken, we're a little broken.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you are now traversing the subterranean depths--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true, we got on sleeves, right? Or is it really, like, humid?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's whatever you wore into Aeor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, but it glows the sleeves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we would've been shedding our coats here because it's getting warmer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We each have one on our hands, so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got one right here now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We love you very much, and is it Thursday yet? Good night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't want to wait a week.
